feed.title: AdGuard Home Manager Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for AdGuard Home Manager: v2.16.3
entry.content: • New design for the updates screen and for the DNS addresses modal

entry.title: New release for AdGuard Home Manager: v2.16.4
entry.content:
• Fix hour mismatch on charts
  • Fix duplicated snackbars on tablet mode
  • Fixed some translations
  • Fixed fallback DNS server fields validation
  • Added posibility to add comments to fallback DNS servers

entry.title: New release for AdGuard Home Manager: v2.17.0
entry.content:
• Added option to block and unblock a domain only for a client from logs
  • Added an option to allow and disallow a client from logs
  • Added an option to add a persistent client from logs
  • Other UI improvements
  • Updated Turkish translation
  • Bug fixes

entry.title: New release for AdGuard Home Manager: v2.17.1
New release for AdGuard Home Manager: v2.18.0
entry.content:
• Added an option to copy to the clipboard some values on the log details screen
  • Added an option to filter logs by added clients
  • Added support for predictive navigation on Android
